commentable_entity.ask: Stop public attacks on Meghan, Amber and their supporters.
commentable_entity.title: Stop public attacks on Meghan, Amber and their supporters.
commentable_entity.description:
The trend lately, is to publicly destroy the lives and reputations of people within the public eye.

Regardless of whether or not they put themselves in the public eye, I feel, but for the grace of God, there go I. It could happen to any one of us. We need more introspection as society.

Why are we so bored with our lives, that slander and hate en mass, is all we are capable of now as society at large?

Completely destroying others have become such huge international sports events, kind of akin to the gladiator days, when parents allowed their children to watch men eaten by lions. Ripped apart to shreds, as the throng screamed and shouted with crazy delight, drunk on seeing the demise of a fellow human brother or sister. 

Then came Christopher E Bouzy to defend and protect Meghan and Harry, but getting attacked, even petitions riddled with lies, to stop him from coming to Meghan and Harry's defence. What a knight. Truly.

Instead of attacking such people with nonsense made up, fakery, petitions and online hate, we should be defending them, protecting them, as this petition does now. 

Amber Heard supporters are daily attacked, most of whom are survivors themselves, so it's not in them to walk away from a fellow survivor.

Amber Heard is heavily attacked. She won the UK court case but lost the USA court case.

Her haters have committed every fraud in the book to destroy Amber, just as society (and stiff upper lip Monarchy staff?) have also bent over backwards to hate on and utterly destroy Meghan, merely because she is not born British. Her entire private life ridiculed by those who have nothing better to do with their boring lives. 

By this petition, I urge you to add your signature, as a pledge to YOURSELF, to do better from now on, if you have been one of those who, without even thinking properly about what you've done, by automatically having joined other people in destroying human lives and families, especially on social media. How about let's all do better? Me too. Remember, change usually starts with us first.

For those who still possess empathy, mercy, compassion and forgiveness, knowing that everyone makes mistakes, often mistakes that we will regret forever (or not) and be ashamed of (or not), forever, but at least we know God has forgiven us all, but only once we had shown him remorse and regret.

Nobody wants to be on the wrong side of God, trust me, been there, got that t-shirt.

Unfortunately the throng, the crowd and all those who have no minds of their own, following the crowd automatically, without thinking,  blindly, are teaching ALL children and youth of the WORLD, by example, that the way to behave is like we're all on the Jerry Springer show.  

Besides that, it hurts to see anyone humiliated, lied to and lied about 24 hours a day, 24/7, by people who barely know them, just for fun, regardless of whether they're famous or not, made some mistake, or not.

Where has our humanity gone to, as society, as individuals?

This petition is a request to first look inward, then sign and share.

Let's try to imagine what it would be like if huge crowds did to us, exactly what we have done, are doing, 24/7 to individuals, based only on a desperate need to "follow the crowd", so that we can posture and pretend we are better than that target ourselves?

Hopefully, this can become a new trend and catches on FAST, to support, instead of to destroy hero's like Christopher E. Bouzy for being so resourceful in protecting and defending a woman and her husband, plus their children, from a society which has grown very dark, very violent, a society which has turned to worshipping and adoring bullies and killers and doing everything God hates. 

Please sign and share. Thank you :) 

Go be happy and make others happy too. Why not?
commentable_entity.letter_body: Stop public attacks on Meghan, Amber and their supporters.
commentable_entity.display_title: Stop public attacks on Meghan, Amber and their supporters.
commentable_entity.petition_title: Stop public attacks on Meghan, Amber and their supporters.
